name: Black Bear

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

notes: Powerful omnivorous mammals found in forests and mountains.
